headline: RBC Capital Increases Price Target on Kinder Morgan, Inc. (KMI)
summary: Kinder Morgan, Inc. (NYSE:KMI) is one of the 13 best oil and gas storage stocks to buy according to hedge funds. On February 27, Elvira Scotto from RBC Capital increased the firm’s price target on Kinder Morgan, Inc. (NYSE:KMI) from $30 to $32. The analyst reaffirmed her Sector Perform rating on the stock. Scotto reflected […]
